description: Creates a specified partition index in an existing table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: Specifies the name of a database in which you want to create a partition index.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: Specifies the name of a table in which you want to create a partition index.

parameters.name: PartitionIndex
parameters.description: Specifies a PartitionIndex structure to create a partition index in an existing table. The keys for the partition index. (string) --- The name of the partition index.

nested_params.name: Keys
nested_params.description: The keys for the partition index.

nested_params.name: IndexName
nested_params.description: The name of the partition index.
